page.title: 08Dumfries Pub Survey
page.content: Many pubs we visited are over a hundred years old. One of them is only five years old. The{Riverside} is not old but is popular, especially on Saturdays. They make around Â£1000 on a busy day. A pub for the young is {Valentino's.}Drink there is a bit dearer than other places. They used to make their own beer. The most historic pub in Dumfries is{The Globe.}It is over three hundred years old and it has been owned for seventy years by Stephen Robb. Its drinks are the cheapest in town and its meals are recommended. They cannot sell The Globe because it belongs to the{Burns Trust}and has links with the famous poet Robert Burns.
